--runner=DataflowRunner
--region=us-central1
--temp_location=gs://temp-storage-for-perf-tests/loadtests
--staging_location=gs://temp-storage-for-perf-tests/loadtests
--input=gs://apache-beam-ml/testing/inputs/sentences_5k.txt
--model_name=google/gemma-2b-it
--machine_type=a2-highgpu-1g
--disk_size_gb=200
--num_workers=2
--max_num_workers=20
--input_options={}
--autoscaling_algorithm=THROUGHPUT_BASED
--publish_to_big_query=true
--metrics_dataset=beam_run_inference
--metrics_table=gemma_vllm_batch
--influx_measurement=gemma_vllm_batch
--device=GPU
--model_gcs_path=gs://apache-beam-ml/models/gemma-2b-it
--sdk_location=container
--sdk_worker_parallelism=0
--experiments=worker_accelerator=type:nvidia-tesla-a100;count:1;install-nvidia-driver,use_runner_v2,no_use_multiple_sdk_containers
